title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python library for running large language models locally with minimal setup.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list, delete models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers to interact with Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package adding Ollama chat, embeddings, and tool-calling support.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for any Ollama model; supports multi-user & plugins.

title: ollama-hack
summary: Community repo collecting hackathon projects: Discord bots, Raycast plugins, Obsidian helpers.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline combining Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store for Q&A.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of community-built function-calling adapters (weather, Slack, GitHub, etc.).

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor, and explain code using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat template that auto-detects local Ollama models and supports file upload.

title: ollama-distro
summary: Unofficial Alpine-based Docker image with CUDA and CPU variants < 300 MB.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Self-hosted Telegram bot that chats through Ollama and supports group whitelist.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir client with GenServer behaviour for streaming Ollama completions into Phoenix apps.

title: ollama4j
summary: Lightweight Java SDK for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client using reqwest and SSE; exposes ergonomic Tokio streams.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Feature-rich TUI chat client with markdown, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot providing slash commands, thread isolation, and per-guild model settings.

title: ollama-model-tools
summary: CLI utilities to convert, quantize, and benchmark GGUF models for Ollama.
